parties.in4010.q12015.group5

Class OpponentModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • parties.in4010.q12015.group5.OpponentModel

  • public class OpponentModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a model of the issue and value weights of an Opponent. This model is built using the Frequency analysis method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<Bid> bidHistory
      The history of bids this opponent has made
      java.util.Map<IssueDiscrete,java.lang.Double> issueModel
      Map containing the modeled issue weight for each issue.
      java.util.Map<IssueDiscrete,java.util.Map<ValueDiscrete,java.lang.Integer>> valueCountModel
      Map containing the observed count every value has been bid.
      java.util.Map<IssueDiscrete,java.util.Map<ValueDiscrete,java.lang.Double>> valueWeightModel
      Map containing the modeled value weight for each value in each issue.
